Others: Bangladesh bowlers responded strongly after Netherlands restricted them for 144/8 in 20 overs, helping them win the match by 9 runs.
Taskin Ahmed led Bangladesh's charge as he finished the contest with four wickets in his quota, conceding 25 runs.
Bangladesh were invited to bat first but a clinical display by Netherlands saw Bangladesh manage a paltry 144/8 on the board in 20 overs.
A 12-ball 20 cameo by Mosaddek Hossain towards the end helped Bangladesh post a fighting total on the board.
Netherlands lost their 7th wicket as Hasan Mahmud scalps his second of the match. Logan van Beek is the new batter in.
Scott Edwards sweeps it straight to Hasan Mahmud as Shakib Al Hasan provides Bangladesh with another breakthrough.
Tim Pringle is the new batter in after Scott Edwards' dismissal.
The game has stopped due to rain.
